user.bio: With 12 years of experience as a Blockchain Strategist and Web3 Architect, I specialize in bridging the gap between traditional industries and decentralized technologies. My expertise spans tokenized assets, crypto payment integrations, and blockchain-driven market solutions.

description:
Ce flux de travail agit comme une **passerelle API centrale** pour tous les agents d'indicateurs techniques dans le **syst√®me AI Quant du March√© Spot Binance**. Il √©coute les requ√™tes webhook entrantes et les achemine dynamiquement vers l'outil d'indicateur bas√© sur le bon intervalle de temps (15m, 1h, 4h, 1j). Con√ßu pour alimenter l'analyse multi-temporelle √† grande √©chelle.

üé• **Regarder le Tutoriel**:
[![Cliquez pour Regarder](https://img.youtube.com/vi/HWHD-eXP0IE/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/HWHD-eXP0IE)

---

## üéØ Ce Qu'il Fait

* Accepte les requ√™tes via webhook avec un symbole de token et un intervalle de temps
* Transmet les requ√™tes √† l'outil d'indicateur technique interne correct
* Retourne une charge utile JSON propre avec RSI, MACD, BBANDS, EMA, SMA et ADX
* Peut √™tre utilis√© directement ou comme un microservice par d'autres agents

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Format d'Entr√©e

Point de terminaison webhook:

```
POST /webhook/indicators
```

Format du corps:

```json
{
  "symbol": "DOGEUSDT",
  "timeframe": "15m"
}
```

---

## üîÑ Logique de Routage

| Intervalle de Temps | Rout√© Vers                        |
| ------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| 15m                 | Outil d'Indicateurs SM 15min     |
| 1h                  | Outil d'Indicateurs SM 1heure    |
| 4h                  | Outil d'Indicateurs SM 4heures    |
| 1j                  | Outil d'Indicateurs SM 1jour      |

---

## üîé Cas d'Utilisation

| Cas d'Utilisation                                   | Description                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| üîó Utilis√© par l'Outil d'Analyse Financi√®re Binance | D√©clenche automatiquement tous les outils d'indicateurs en parall√®le |
| ü§ñ Int√©gr√© dans le Syst√®me AI Quant de Binance      | Soutient le raisonnement, la g√©n√©ration de signaux et les r√©sum√©s   |
| ‚öôÔ∏è Peut √™tre appel√© ind√©pendamment pour un acc√®s aux donn√©es brutes | Utile pour les tableaux de bord ou l'analyse avanc√©e            |

---

## üì§ Exemple de Sortie

```json
{
  "symbol": "DOGEUSDT",
  "timeframe": "15m",
  "rsi": 56.7,
  "macd": "Croisement Baissier",
  "bbands": "Stable",
  "ema": "Prix au-dessus de l'EMA",
  "adx": 19.4
}
```

---

## ‚úÖ Pr√©requis

* Assurez-vous que tous les flux de travail suivants sont install√©s et op√©rationnels:

  * Outil d'Indicateurs SM 15min
  * Outil d'Indicateurs SM 1heure
  * Outil d'Indicateurs SM 4heures
  * Outil d'Indicateurs SM 1jour
* Identifiants OpenAI (pour tout agent utilisant le formatage LLM)

---

## üßæ Licence & Attribution

Toute la logique de routage architecturale et la structuration des points de terminaison sont prot√©g√©es par des droits de propri√©t√© intellectuelle.
Aucune rebranding ou revente non autoris√©e n'est permise.

‚Ä¢ **RSI, MACD, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX**

# üß™ Binance SM Indicators Webhook Tool ‚Äì Documentation

A backend webhook processor that performs **real-time indicator calculations** for 15m, 1h, 4h, and 1d Binance candlestick data. This workflow powers all the indicator sub-agents and is essential for maintaining modular and scalable logic across timeframes.

---

## üéØ Purpose

* Accepts HTTP POST requests from the 15m, 1h, 4h, or 1d sub-agents
* Pulls raw OHLCV kline data for the symbol and interval
* Calculates technical indicators:

  * RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SMA, EMA, ADX
* Returns structured JSON with labeled values (e.g., `"MACD_Cross": "Bullish"`)

This tool ensures **centralized logic reuse** across all timeframe agents while improving speed and maintainability.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Key Components

| Node Name              | Description                                               |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Webhook Trigger`      | Handles POST at `/15m-indicators`, `/1h-indicators`, etc. |
| `Extract Symbol`       | Validates input payload (must include `symbol`)           |
| `Fetch Binance Klines` | Gets latest 100 candles using `/api/v3/klines`            |
| `RSI Calculator`       | Computes 14-period RSI from closing prices                |
| `MACD Calculator`      | Computes 12, 26, 9 MACD with signal and histogram         |
| `BBANDS Calculator`    | Calculates 20-period bands using std. deviation           |
| `SMA/EMA Node`         | Computes 20-period simple and exponential MAs             |
| `ADX Calculator`       | Computes 14-period trend strength (DI+/DI‚àí included)      |
| `Prepare Output`       | Returns JSON with all labeled indicators                  |

---

## üì• Expected Input (from sub-agent)

```json
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
}
```

Must be a valid Binance Spot trading pair. Interval is auto-routed based on webhook endpoint:

| Endpoint Path     | Interval |
| ----------------- | -------- |
| `/15m-indicators` | 15m      |
| `/1h-indicators`  | 1h       |
| `/4h-indicators`  | 4h       |
| `/1d-indicators`  | 1d       |

---

## üìä Sample Output JSON

```json
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "interval": "4h",
  "rsi": 65.1,
  "macd": {
    "value": 24.3,
    "signal": 21.7,
    "histogram": 2.6,
    "cross": "Bullish"
  },
  "bb": {
    "basis": 62600,
    "upper": 63500,
    "lower": 61700,
    "status": "Expanding"
  },
  "sma": 62000,
  "ema": 62400,
  "adx": {
    "value": 32.8,
    "strength": "Strong"
  }
}
```

---

## üß© Use Case Scenarios

| Scenario                                   | Result                                                   |
| ------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| 15m tool POSTs to `/15m-indicators`        | Webhook responds with 15m indicator set                  |
| Financial Analyst Tool requests 1h signals | This workflow handles the actual math for each indicator |
| 1d tool needs RSI + MACD + ADX             | Centralized logic avoids duplication across agents       |

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Installation Instructions

### 1. Import & Activate

* Import JSON into n8n
* Ensure webhook is live and accessible
* Test each endpoint (e.g., `/1h-indicators`) via POST

### 2. Connect to Binance API

* Public API: no credentials required
* Ensure the HTTP request node for klines uses:

  ```
  https://api.binance.com/api/v3/klines
  ```

### 3. Link to Sub-Agent Workflows

* 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d tools all depend on this for logic
* Must POST `symbol` to the correct interval endpoint

---

## üì¶ Example Workflow Integration

All the following tools rely on this:

* `Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool`
* `Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool`
* `Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool`
* `Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool`

This acts as the math engine behind each.

---
